description: Understand fundamental economic principles, market systems, and how economic decisions shape our world.

lessons.title: What is Economics?
lessons.description: Understanding scarcity, choice, and opportunity cost

sections.content: Economics is the study of how individuals, businesses, and societies make choices about using limited resources. It affects everything from personal finances to global trade.

lessons.title: Supply and Demand
lessons.description: The fundamental forces that determine prices

sections.content: Supply and demand are the twin forces that drive market economies. Understanding how they interact helps explain price changes and market behavior.

lessons.title: Market Structures
lessons.description: Different types of competition and market organization

sections.content: Markets can be organized in different ways, from perfect competition to monopolies, each with distinct characteristics and outcomes.
Macroeconomics examines the economy as a whole, including growth, unemployment, inflation, and government policy.

lessons.title: Money, Banking, and Monetary Policy
lessons.description: The role of money and central banks in the economy

sections.content: Money, banks, and central banks play crucial roles in modern economies, influencing interest rates, inflation, and economic growth.

lessons.title: Global Economics and Trade
lessons.description: International trade, exchange rates, and globalization

sections.content: In our interconnected world, understanding international trade, exchange rates, and global economic relationships is essential.
